com.meteorcode.pathway.io

Class RedirectFileHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meteorcode.pathway.io.FileHandle
      • com.meteorcode.pathway.io.RedirectFileHandle

  • public class RedirectFileHandle
extends FileHandle
    Wraps another FileHandle with a different virtual path. This is for internal use only.

    Created by hawk on 8/27/14.

    • Constructor Summary

        Returns an OutputStream for writing to this file.
        Specified by:
        write in class FileHandle
        Parameters:
        append - If false, this file will be overwritten if it exists, otherwise it will be appended.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        IOException - if something went wrong while opening the file.

      • isDirectory

        public boolean isDirectory()
        Returns true if this file is a directory.

        Note that this may return false if a directory exists but is empty. This is Not My Fault, it's util.File behaviour.

        Specified by:
        isDirectory in class FileHandle
        Returns:
        true if this file is a directory, false otherwise

        Returns:
